Name: Zoning, 2226 Third Avenue, Manhattan (C 230346 ZSM)
Title: Application number C 230346 ZSM (2226 Third Avenue) submitted by REEC Third Ave., LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 138-42 of the Zoning Resolution to allow a reduction in the number of required loading berths from three to one loading berth, in connection with a proposed commercial building on property located at 2226 Third Avenue (Block 1770, Lot 36), in a C4-6 District, within the Special East Harlem Corridors District (EHC), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 11, Council District 8.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises

Attachments.Name: Calendar of the Zoning Subcommittee Meeting - January 23, 2024
